PositionHistory.Title: Business Analyst
PositionHistory.Description: NebuLogic Technologies LLC., Hyderabad, India Dec '11 - Nov '12 Business Analyst

Client: Xerox, USA
Major Projects ~ Project 3 ~ (from Jul '12 to Nov '12) • Project for DHS - NJ (Department of Human Services, State of New Jersey) for their social welfare service information provided to children. The department provides social services and program for children welfare. • Involved in the creation of Business Requirements Document (BRD) with Process Flows (MS Visio Diagram) and Work Status Report (WSR) creation along with Functional Specifications Document (FSD). • Work delegation to other team members and configuration of CRM On Demand application (Field Setup, Role Management and access profiles, Page Layouts).

PositionHistory.Title: Role Management and access profiles, Page Layouts

OrgName.OrganizationName: California Public Utilities Commission, State of California

PositionHistory.Description: ~ Project 2 ~ (Development from Mar '12 to Jul '12, Support on-going) • Project for CPUC - CA (California Public Utilities Commission, State of California). The CA-LifeLine program provides discounted basic telephone (landline) services to eligible California households based on either income or program they are enrolled into. • Involved in Business Requirements Document (BRD), Work Status Report (WSR), Functional Specifications Document (FSD), Use Cases creation. • Understanding Business Requirements and converting it into design and Process Flows (Visio Diagrams). • Work delegation to other team members and configuration of CRM On Demand application (Field Setup, Role Management and access profiles, Page Layouts). • Migration of the application from Staging to Production Environment. • Writing Workflows in CRM On Demand and creating different Reports based on business requirements. • End to end testing (Unit Testing and User Acceptance Testing) of the entire solution.

PositionHistory.Title: Consultant/Engineer
PositionHistory.Description: November, 2012. • Worked as a SAP BI Consultant/Engineer with MindTree Ltd., Bangalore from October, 2008 to February, 2010.

PositionHistory.Title: SAP BI Consultant/Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
MindTree Ltd., Bangalore, India Oct '08 - Feb '10 SAP BI Consultant/Engineer
2 Client: Unilever, UK / Hindustan Unilever Ltd (Onsite - Bangalore, India)
Major Projects ~ Project 3 ~ • Handling development as well as providing support for iFinance - module to consolidate financial data of Unilever around the globe (Central Europe, Middle East, Indian Sub continent, East Africa). • Enabling changes in various iFinance Reporting KPI's using SAP BI as required by UEx (Unilever Executives).
~ Project 2 ~ • Evolved Online Dashboard on BO Xcelsius/Crystal Dashboard Reports 2008 for HUL Finance Team through BW Queries. • Developed Forecast Analytics Online Dashboard on Business Objects Xcelsius 2008 through BW Queries and advance MS Excel. • Interfaced with the client directly regarding the requirement gathering and feedbacks. • Conducted training sessions for new team members on Xcelsius/Crystal Dashboard Reports 2008.
~ Project 1 ~ • Functioned as a part of HUL Image Migration Development Team thereby involved in designing as well as developing MIS reports and published the same on enterprise portal (pre-calculated Excel Reports based on daily sales) daily. • Possessed accountability for Process Chain Management of forecasting and daily sales. • Handled Data Validation at different levels; prepared reports regarding Forecast, Demand Planning, Production Planning and Sales. • Developed KPI's (Key Performance Indicator) to calculate safety stock of a distributor; handled capacity planning; to find the reason for demand error; to calculate sales when there is inter-distributor stock transfer. • Worked as a part of SAP BI upgrade to EhP1 team for the testing; handled Unit testing of all the modules. • Actively participated in winning the 'Team Spot Award' in September '09 for High Innovation, Passion and Commitment.

PositionHistory.Title: System Administrator
PositionHistory.Description: INDUSTRIAL EXPOSURE Stryker Global Technology Centre, Gurgaon, India Jul '14 - till date System Administrator

Client: Stryker, USA
Major Projects (from Jul '14 to till date) ~ Project 1 ~ • Support for Stryker's Navigation, Instruments and SGTC Division on PLM Windchill PDMLink. • Working in co-ordination with different teams situated globally (Kalamazoo, MI, USA; Freiburg, Germany; Mahwah, NJ, USA) in an agile environment closely with users and managers to resolve issues. • Monitoring tickets and Service Level Agreements (SLA) as a day today activity on ServiceNow. • Work on continuous service improvements to enhance the capabilities of our solutions. • Find root cause analysis of issues and propose solutions. • Configuration of PLM Windchill system and maintenance on day today basis.
1 • Won Global IT Spot Award in November, 2014 for outstanding collaboration and team work.

PositionHistory.Title: CRM Administrator
PositionHistory.Description: Stryker Global Technology Centre, Gurgaon, India Nov '12 - Jun, '14 CRM Administrator

PositionHistory.Title: Administrator catering to more than 600 active users
PositionHistory.Description:
Client: Stryker, USA (Onsite - Kalamazoo, MI, USA)
Major Projects (from Nov '12 to Jun '14) ~ Project 1 ~ • Support and development of Medical Field Service Project for Stryker, USA as an Oracle CRM On Demand Administrator catering to more than 600 active users. • Business Analyst to gather requirements for new service improvements along with functional and technical documentation. Propose and design solutions based on requirements from all stakeholders. • Work for Stryker's Medical and Surgical Divisions Products. • Configuration and testing (Unit Testing and User Acceptance Testing (UAT)) of end to end service improvements (change request) and monitoring integrations with other systems and functional extensions. • Monitoring tickets and Service Level Agreements (SLA) as a day today activity on ServiceNow. • Create Surveys using OnDemand Marketing tool and integrate it with our system and reporting the results. • Working in co-ordination with different teams situated globally in an agile environment closely with users and managers to resolve issues. Follow defined IT Quality procedures for change request approval.

EmployerOrg.EmployerOrgName: Department of Child and Family Services

PositionHistory.Title: Role Management and access profiles, Page Layouts
PositionHistory.Description: ~ Project 1 ~ (Development from Dec '11 to Mar '12, Support on-going) • Project for DCFS - LA - Phase 3 (Department of Child and Family Services, State of Louisiana) for their social welfare service information and escalation. The department provides social services programs, such as the rehabilitation of handicapped persons, child welfare, blind services and public assistance programs. • Work delegation to other team members and configuration of CRM On Demand application (Field Setup, Role Management and access profiles, Page Layouts). • Writing Workflows in CRM On Demand and migration of the application from Staging to Production Environment. • Testing (Unit Testing and User Acceptance Testing) of the entire solution. • Document creation for User Training, Testing, Technical and Functional specifications, Business Requirements, Work status reports.
